title: Arabic 21
text: Upon the tree of effulgent glory I have hung for thee the choicest fruits, wherefore hast thou turned away and contented thyself with that which is less good? Return then unto that which is better for thee in the realm on high.
teaser: Upon the tree of effulgent glory...

prev.title: Arabic 20
prev.text: My claim on thee is great, it cannot be forgotten. My grace to thee is plenteous, it cannot be veiled. My love has made in thee its home, it cannot be concealed. My light is manifest to thee, it cannot be obscured.
prev.teaser: My claim on thee is great...

next.title: Arabic 22
next.text: Noble have I created thee, yet thou hast abased thyself. Rise then unto that for which thou wast created.
